title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 581 - Enforcement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 581 - Enforcement

State Regulations

Subpart 581-1 - Introduction (§ 581-1.1 to 581-1.2)

Subpart 581-2 - General Enforcement Process (§ 581-2.1 to 581-2.8)

Subpart 581-3 - Permit Modifications, Suspensions and Revocations (§ 581-3.1 to 581-3.5)

Subpart 581-4 - Adjudicatory Hearings (§ 581-4.1 to 581-4.16)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. II, pt. 581

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 804[9], 809[14], 813; Environmental Conservation Law, §§15-2709.1, 15-2723, 24-0805, 24- 0903[5]; art. 71, titles 11 and
23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
